thread.section_title: Business-in-a-Box Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Business-in-a-Box | business-in-a-box.com
thread.title: Francis B.

author: Francis B.
title: Francis B.
text:
They have a new version on the website for Windows 10. It's really quickly to install and I could check the docs I needed before purchasing it. Very useful stuff there. I did not have any problem to activate with the product key they sent. They offer additional users and lifetime updates with a discount on the first purchase. The only thing is that you cannot purchase just one doc or two, I had to purchase the package, but anyway, it is a one time purchase for a reasonable price and the docs can be useful anyway.
Summary
I recommend this product. Specially because you can install the demo and check the docs before you purchase.
